title: Bug 4329 - No results when searched via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
description: Bug 4329 - No results when searched via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
OB: When searching for declarations via the Package view selection and dialog, no results are displayed.
EB: When searching for declarations via the Package view selection and dialog, the expected behavior is to display the search results.
SR:
1. Open the Package view.
2. Select a package.
3. Right-click and select 'Search' from the context menu.
4. In the search dialog, enter the desired search term.
5. Click on the 'Search' button.
6. Observe that no search results are displayed.
